content: --ज {%<ab>a.</ab>%} born or produced in water. (--जः {1} an aquatic animal. {2} a fish. {3} sea-salt. {4} a collective name for several signs of the zodiac. {5} moss. {6} the moon. (--जः, --जं {1} a shell. {2} the conch-shell; अधरोष्ठे निवेश्य दध्मौ जलजं कुमारः <ls>R. 7. 63</ls>, <ls n="R.">10. 60.</ls> (--जं a lotus.
